text:
I absolutely loved my experience at #3 Cafe Bar! The vibe is perfect—cozy yet trendy, with great music and stylish decor. The staff was incredibly friendly and attentive, making sure everything was just right. Hardly you will see the boss cooking and watering but this one such exception. Dashing out of the kitchen to serve the diners, he has all my respect.

The food and drinks were outstanding albeit slightly towards the salty side. The menu offers a delicious mix of fresh, high-quality ingredients, and everything I tried was flavorful and beautifully presented.

A cosy and chic cafe & bar with friendly and efficient service. The food presentation was impressive, and while some dishes didn’t quite suit our taste buds, we might have just ordered the wrong ones. The pork risotto was the standout dish, rich and flavorful, while the Yuzu drinks were refreshing. We may return to explore more of the menu.

I newly discovered a good place in Hougang, really chill and good food for a good value of Money :-). Its chill vibe and the service is amazing. Definitely will come back and try other food selection on the menu.
Cheers

Their meats are really good. Can't remember exactly what we ordered but the steak, pork and bacon was really flavourful.

The rosti however was disappointing - way too oily. Used a couple of serviettes to remove the oil but it was still wayyyy too oily as u can see from the picture. Didn't finish it in the end. Hope they can work on it

Unassuming restaurant/bistro at Kovan!
The food is so good! Didn’t expect to find such a good western food at this hidden gem. All the dishes we had are well-executed.

Even Martini is good too! We ordered Chrysanthemum Martini. The taste is well-balanced.
*There’s one-for-one Martini after 7pm

Staff here is very attentive too!
